erlref.modulesummary: New lists implementation with O(1) for lists:length/1 and some other behaviour changes.

description.p: New lists implementation with O(1) for lists:length/1 and some other behaviour changes

func.name: from_list(T::[T]) -> edis_list(T)
func.fsummary: returns an edis_list with the same elements of the list.

desc.p: returns an edis_list with the same elements of the list

func.name: to_list(Edis_list::edis_list(T)) -> [T]
func.fsummary: returns a list with the same elements of the edis_list.

desc.p: returns a list with the same elements of the edis_list

func.name: nth(N::pos_integer(), Edis_list::edis_list(T)) -> T | undefined
func.fsummary: returns the Nth element of the list L.

desc.p: returns the Nth element of the list L

func.name: nthtail(N::non_neg_integer(), Edis_list::edis_list(T)) -> edis_list(T)
func.fsummary: returns the Nth tail of the list L.

desc.p: returns the Nth tail of the list L

func.name: reverse(EL::edis_list(T)) -> edis_list(T)
func.fsummary: reverses all elements in the list L.

desc.p: reverses all elements in the list L.

func.name: splitwith(Pred::(T) -> boolean(), Edis_list::edis_list(T)) -> {edis_list(T), edis_list(T)}
func.fsummary: partition edis_list into two edis_lists according to Pred.

desc.p: partition edis_list into two edis_lists according to Pred

func.name: insert(T, Position::before | 'after', T, EL::edis_list(T)) -> edis_list(T)
func.fsummary: insert a value before or after the pivot.

desc.p: insert a value before or after the pivot

func.name: push(T0, Edis_list::edis_list(T)) -> edis_list(T | T0)
func.fsummary: inserts X to the left of the list.

desc.p: inserts X to the left of the list

func.name: pop(Edis_list::edis_list(T)) -> {T, edis_list(T)}
func.fsummary: pops the leftmost element of the list.

desc.p: pops the leftmost element of the list

func.name: sublist(Edis_list::edis_list(T), Start::pos_integer(), Len::non_neg_integer()) -> edis_list(T)
func.fsummary: Returns the sub-list starting at Start of length Length.

desc.p: Returns the sub-list starting at Start of length Length.

func.name: filter(Pred::(T) -> boolean(), Edis_list::edis_list(T)) -> edis_list(T)
func.fsummary: Returns an edis_list of all elements Elem in the received edis_list for which Pred(Elem) returns true.

desc.p: Returns an edis_list of all elements Elem in the received edis_list for which Pred(Elem) returns true.

func.name: remove(T, Count::non_neg_integer(), EL::edis_list(T)) -> edis_list(T)
func.fsummary: Removes the first N elements which compares equal to the value.

desc.p: Removes the first N elements which compares equal to the value

func.name: split(N::non_neg_integer(), EL::edis_list(T)) -> {edis_list(T), edis_list(T)}
func.fsummary: Splits the received list into two lists.

desc.p: Splits the received list into two lists. The first list contains the first N elements and the other list the rest of the elements (the Nth tail)
